questions.question: What is the dominant color of the glove's main body?
What is the primary material visibly composing the glove?
Describing the texture of the cuff, is it smooth or patterned?
What color is the visible knitted cuff detailing?
What color is the hem or wristband at the glove's base?
What is the overall shape of the glove depicted in the image?
Considering the cuff's construction, is it ribbed or flat?
Based on the image, does the glove appear to be seamless or contain visible seams?
Observing the material closely, does it seem thick or thin in construction?
What is the apparent finish of the main body material, glossy or matte?
What is the type of visible markings on the glove's back?
What is the overall style of the glove; work, dress, etc?
Is the glove design primarily plain or intricately detailed?
Considering the material and design, what is the apparent use of the glove?
What is the visible size indicated on the glove?
